publisher.publisher-name: The Department of Plant Taxonomy and Ecology, L. Eötvös University

title-group.article-title: Automated data bases for the vegetation of Latvia

permissions.copyright-statement: © Department of Plant Taxonomy and Ecology, ELTE

abstract.p: Reported is the experience for creating automated data bases, including their pattern, for plant communities. A library for geographical, ecological and biological indices for vascular plants is described; the possibilities for automated map charting are discussed.
